info.title: Vonage
info.description: The Vonage API Platform enables you to add communications within the context of your applications, including SMS, Voice and Chat. Sign up for a Nexmo account here - https://www.vonage.com/

post.description: Use Verify request to generate and send a PIN to your user

parameters.x-ms-summary: You can find your API secret in your [account dashboard](https://dashboard.nexmo.com)

parameters.description: The mobile or landline phone number to verify. Unless you are setting `country` explicitly, this number must be in [E.164](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/E.164) format
parameters.x-ms-summary: The mobile or landline phone number to verify. Unless you are setting `country` explicitly, this number must be in [E.164](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/E.164) format
parameters.name: number

parameters.description: If you do not provide `number` in international format or you are not sure if `number` is correctly formatted, specify the two-character country code in `country`. Verify will then format the number for you
parameters.x-ms-summary: If you do not provide `number` in international format or you are not sure if `number` is correctly formatted, specify the two-character country code in `country`. Verify will then format the number for you
parameters.name: country

parameters.description: An 18-character alphanumeric string you can use to personalize the verification request SMS body, to help users identify your company or application name. For example: "Your `Acme Inc` PIN is ..."
parameters.x-ms-summary: An 18-character alphanumeric string you can use to personalize the verification request SMS body, to help users identify your company or application name
parameters.name: brand

parameters.description: An 11-character alphanumeric string that represents the [identity of the sender](https://developer.nexmo.com/messaging/sms/guides/custom-sender-id) of the verification request. Depending on the destination of the phone number you are sending the verification SMS to, restrictions might apply
parameters.x-ms-summary: An 11-character alphanumeric string that represents the [identity of the sender](https://developer.nexmo.com/messaging/sms/guides/custom-sender-id) of the verification request. Depending on the destination of the phone number you are sending the verification SMS to, restrictions might apply
parameters.name: sender_id

parameters.description: The length of the verification code
parameters.x-ms-summary: The length of the verification code
parameters.name: code_length

parameters.description: By default, the SMS or text-to-speech (TTS) message is generated in the locale that matches the `number`. For example, the text message or TTS message for a `33*` number is sent in French. Use this parameter to explicitly control the language used for the Verify request. A list of languages is available: <https://developer.vonage.com/verify/guides/verify-languages>
parameters.x-ms-summary: By default, the SMS or text-to-speech (TTS) message is generated in the locale that matches the `number`. For example, the text message or TTS message for a `33*` number is sent in French. Use this parameter to explicitly control the language used for the Verify request. A list of languages is available: <https://developer.vonage.com/verify/guides/verify-languages>
parameters.name: lg

parameters.description: How long the generated verification code is valid for, in seconds. When you specify both `pin_expiry` and `next_event_wait` then `pin_expiry` must be an integer multiple of `next_event_wait` otherwise `pin_expiry` is defaulted to equal next_event_wait. See [changing the event timings](https://developer.nexmo.com/verify/guides/changing-default-timings)
parameters.x-ms-summary: How long the generated verification code is valid for, in seconds. When you specify both `pin_expiry` and `next_event_wait` then `pin_expiry` must be an integer multiple of `next_event_wait` otherwise `pin_expiry` is defaulted to equal next_event_wait. See [changing the event timings](https://developer.nexmo.com/verify/guides/changing-default-timings)
parameters.name: pin_expiry

parameters.description: Specifies the wait time in seconds between attempts to deliver the verification code
parameters.x-ms-summary: Specifies the wait time in seconds between attempts to deliver the verification code
parameters.name: next_event_wait

parameters.description: Selects the predefined sequence of SMS and TTS (Text To Speech) actions to use in order to convey the PIN to your user. For example, an id of 1 identifies the workflow SMS - TTS - TTS. For a list of all workflows and their associated ids, please visit the [developer portal](https://developer.nexmo.com/verify/guides/workflows-and-events)
parameters.x-ms-summary: Selects the predefined sequence of SMS and TTS (Text To Speech) actions to use in order to convey the PIN to your user. For example, an id of 1 identifies the workflow SMS - TTS - TTS. For a list of all workflows and their associated ids, please visit the [developer portal](https://developer.nexmo.com/verify/guides/workflows-and-events)
parameters.name: workflow_id
